text: Ezakhe izingelosi eziqaphelayo ngaphambili (komuntu ngamunye) nangemva kwakhe ziyamlondoloza ngempoqo kaMvelinqangi akasiguquli isimo sabantu kuze kube ilapho beguqula lokho okusemiphefumulweni yabo futhi uma uMvelinqangi eqonde okubi ebantwini akekho ongakuphindisela emumva futhi abanaye umvikeli ngaphandle kwakhe
